1.content:
Alright, the first question is:

Is this person we are focusing on

A. Nighttime toilet training?

or B. Suffering from bedwetting?
1.title: Beginning

11121.content:
Once upon a time there was a little boy who was four years old (well, if you want to get technical, four and a half), who lived with his parents and his older sister Roxanne.
The boy's name was Carter, and while he was potty trained during the day, he was still learning to use the toilet at night.
He....
11121.title: Carter, age 4 1/2

111211.content: Alright, so the little lad has some protection at night. Now what is it, eh?
111211.title: Wore protection.

1112111.content:
Carter wore diapers to bed at night.
Where is he now?
1112111.title: Nighttime diaper

11121111.content:
Carter is laid down after his bath and changed into his diaper.

"Do you have to go before bed?" Dad asks.
11121111.title: Getting ready for bed.

111211111.content:
"No," said Carter.
So, then, his father...
111211111.title: Carter says no.

111211112.content: Carter shifted, nodding. He had to...
111211112.title: Carter says yes.

choices: Carter's father turns the lights out.
1112111121.content:
"Yes, I have to pee," said Carter, so he went to the bathroom, pulled his pants down, and peed.
He then finished up, washed his hands, and got into bed.
What happens now?
1112111121.title: Pee heavily

1112111122.content:
Carter had to poop, so he went into the bathroom, sat on the toilet, and did his business.
When he was done, he wiped himself, flushed the toilet, put his diaper back on, pulled up his pants, and washed his hands.
He then went back to bed, where...
1112111122.title: Poop heavily

1112111123.content:
He had to pee *and* poop, so his dad helped him out of his diaper, then he went to the bathroom to take care of business.
When he was done, his dad helped him into his diaper again and he washed his hands.
He then...
1112111123.title: Pee and Poop Heavily

choices: Being put down from a nap
Waking up in the middle of the night

It was bedtime.
Carter got changed into his PJs and diaper.
What happens now?
111211122.title: Going to bed

111211123.content:
Carter woke up.
He looked around; it wasn't morning yet.
Was his diaper wet?
111211123.title: Waking up in the middle of the night

1112111231.content: This makes Carter feel a negative emotion. Which one?
1112111231.title: Yes.

choices: He was sick of bedwetting and wanted it to stop.
He didn't want to spend time getting his diaper changed.
He was having such a good dream.
A technique that he'd tried to stop wetting had failed.

Carter was embarrassed, but he decided he needed to get his diaper changed anyway.
Blushing, he went over to...
11121112312.title: Embarrasment.

When was he going to stop wetting already?!
But he still had a wet diaper to deal with, so he went over to...

Carter felt he was too grown up for diapers or Pull-Ups, so he wore underwear to bed.
But he had a plastic sheet so that the mattress didn't get wet.

choices: Being put down from a nap?
Waking up in the middle of the night

choices: He gets read a bedtime story.

It was bedtime for Carter.
He was in his PJs and climbing into his bed with the plastic sheet.

He looked around and could tell that it was the middle of the night.

Carter fell asleep and had a nightmare.
Carter had a nice dream involving water.

Carter wore Peejamas-fancy absorbent PJs that meant he didn't need any diapers or Pull-Ups.

Carter's put into them after his bath, and then snuggles up into bed. What happened after than that?

Did anyone hear him?

Carter fell asleep.
He soon began having a nightmare--- his mother was there, but she had a dog's face and she was threatening to throw his father out the window!
Does Carter wake up from the nightmare?
111211312.title: Carter fell asleep and had a nightmare.

111211313.content: Carter had a nice dream as he slept. He dreamt he was a captain aboard a ship, sailing the seven seas. This caused his little bladder ro kick into gear. A few droplets of pee began dribbling ibto his peejamas. Does he awaken?
111211313.title: Carter had a nice dream involving water.

Carter woke up, but he was already peeing.
He ran to the bathroom, but was he able to get any pee into the toilet?
1112113131.title: Yes

1112113132.content:
Carter didn't wake up, so he fully wet his peejamas.
Thankfully, they worked and the bed didn't get wet.

1112113132.title: No

111211314.content:
Carter had a good dream.
He dreamt he could fly and had a talking, flying cat for a sidekick.

111211314.title: Carter had a good dream.

Little Carter wore some underpants which were absorbent but not like diapers.

Michael was a 3 year old boy who had just gotten into daytime undies but still wet the bed. His parents aren't concerned, as he's still young.

After Michael's evening bath, Dad laid him down to put him into a...

Dad put Michael into a diaper.
"This is just in case you pee in the night," he said, "It's normal for kids your age to not know how to wake up at night to pee. You'll get it eventually."
Michael then put on his pyjamas and Dad tucked him in bed with a bedtime story.
What now?
111221.title: ...diaper.

111222.content:
Dad helped Michael get into his nighttime Pull-Up and pyjamas.
He then sang him a lullaby, turned out the light, and left the room.
"Goodnight, my little boy," he said.
What happens now?
111222.title: ...night Pull-Up.

He wakes up, having to go.

1112221.title: Something happens at night.

Michael was having a nightmare.
It was about a nasty man in a black cloak trying to feed him to a fish with six eyes!
He woke up with a start to find that...
11122211.title: A nightmare.

He dreamt that he was at the beach and it was raining and they were having a hose fight.
This made him have to pee.

11122212.title: A watery dream that makes Michael wanna pee.

11122213.content:
Michael woke up in the night.
He had to go to the bathroom, so he went into the bathroom, peed, and washed his hands.
He then went back to bed and fell asleep.
The next morning, he was...
11122213.title: He wakes up, having to go.

11122214.content:
Michael woke up wet.
He went to get his Pull-Up changed by...
11122214.title: He wakes up, already wet.

111223.content:
Michael wore undies to bed because he felt he was too old for diapers or Pull-Ups.
But his bed had protective sheets so that the mattress didn't get wet.
"Nighty-night, Michael," he said, and...
111223.title: ...bed with protective sheets.

111224.content:
Dad was putting Michael into a pair of cloth bedwetting pants.
They were designed to make it so that Michael could tell he was wet, but his pants stayed dry.
Then, Dad...
111224.title: ...cloth bedwetting pants.

1211.content: What's the exact age of the bedwetter?

12122.content: Your name is Tyler, you turned 8 about 4 months ago and you are still having trouble keeping your pants dry at night. Because of this your parents decide to keep you in...
12122.title: Eight.

choices: Complaining to his parents about the Pull-Ups.
121221.content:
This isn't a "you" story, it's all in third person.

Once upon a time, there was an eight-year-old boy named Tyler.
He was clever, but he still wet the bed at night, so his parents, Louise and Henry, decided to keep him in Pull-Ups at night.

Tyler hated the Pull-Ups! He wasn't a baby!
But his parents thought it was what was best for him.
Where is Tyler when we first see him?
121221.title: Night time pull ups

choices: A t-shirt with some pj pants
1212211.content:
We join Tyler as he is exiting the bathroom after a lengthy shower. He walks to his room with a towel around his waist and prepares to get ready for bed. Tyler opens his closet and takes out one of his night time pull ups from the large card board package, he looks at the pull-up feeling embarrassed that he still had night time accidents, his parents always tell him, “As soon as we know you can stay dry through the night you wont need them any more, promise.”

Tyler always tried his hardest to stay dry at night but whatever he seems to try seems to still leave him wet in the morning, even forcing himself to go pee right before bed doesn't seem to help.

Which leaves him where he is now, pulling on a boys night time pull-up, complete with space and night sky designs, over his privates. Tyler then looks at his options for pajamas tonight...
1212211.title: Getting ready for bed.

12122111.content: What kind of designs does Tyler wear on his pjs?
12122111.title: A t-shirt with some pj pants

choices: Watch a movie with his parents
121221111.content:
Tyler likes everything about sports, especially watching his favorite teams and players play. So, he picked out his favorite pair of pj pants, they were black pants with the logo of every NFL football team on them. With these, Tyler picked out a shirt with the name and number of his favorite player on the back and the team logo on the front.

Tyler slid the pants up his legs and over his fresh, clean pull-up, which was covered with child-like space and planet designs. The pull-up visibly peeked above the waistline of the pants and an outline of the absorbent underwear also showed through the pants in the front and back, especially when Tyler would bend down to pick something up. He then pulled his night shirt over his head and decided what to do with the rest of the night...
121221111.title: Sporty pjs

12122112.content: How about a footed sleeper?
12122112.title: Something else

121222.content:
This isn't a "you" story, it's all in third person.

Really? Diapers? That's not the only option.
Tyler had....
121222.title: Diapers

12123.content: Is our bedwetting boy 9 or 10?

1213.content: How old is the boy?

12132.content: Your name is Dylan and you are just about 12 and a half at this point, however, you are still having a hard time staying dry through the night. Because of this, you need to wear night time protection every night in order for you to stay dry. But what kind of protection do you wear?
12132.title: Twelve.

choices: About to start getting ready for bed
121321.content:
As it turns out, you are a very heavy wetter and the only form of protection the seems to handle your accidents are youth diapers, your parents have tried a few times to move you into pull-up style briefs but this only resulted in damp sheets and wet pjs.

Where do we find Dylan at this point in the story?
121321.title: Tape-on diapers

choices: Ask one of your parents for help
1213211.content: As you finish up eating dinner, your mom suggests that you start getting ready for bed, you agree and proceed to the bathroom. After a quick shower you make sure to fully use the bathroom and you exit to your room. You know it is now time to get your night diaper on...
1213211.title: About to start getting ready for bed

12132111.content:
You grab a diaper from the package in the closet and begin to unfold it. You lay out the diaper on your bed and drop your towel after drying off your privates. You then begin to put the diaper on yourself as you have done every night since your parents decided you were old enough to put your own diaper on.

So you position your bottom on the diaper and, after a sprinkle of baby powder, attach the tapes snugly around your waist and with. After standing up to put the final adjustments on the diapers fit, you are bow ready for bed, but is Dylan going right to bed or doing something else?
12132111.title: Tape the diaper on yourself

choices: get up and go to the bathroom
121321111.content:
You slip into bed and pull out the book you’re keeping under your pillow to read a few more chapters. After about half an hour your mom comes by to wish you a good night. “You got school tomorrow, time to sleep”, she gently reminds you.
“Just ten more minutes”, you plead.
“Ten minutes”, mom agrees. She lingers a moment longer at the door before she goes back to the living room.
You return your attention to your book. The story is way to enthralling to stop right now, so ten minutes soon become twenty, then thirty. Just as you turn the page to yet another chapter, you feel a little twitch from your bladder. It’s not urgent, but you realize you need to pee.
121321111.title: Right to bed

12132112.content:
The whole process of lining yourself up on the diaper and then getting the tapes just tight enough around your waist without pulling them too tight is something that you always seemed to have trouble doing by yourself, despite some efforts by your parents to help teach you , you always preferred when someone else put you in your night diaper

Who do you ask tonight?
12132112.title: Ask one of your parents for help

121321121.content:
After quickly drying yourself off you yell down the stairs to your mom, “ok mom, i’m ready” you say as you lay down on the bed in only your towel.

Mom comes in and grabs a diaper from the large supply in your closet. “All set Dyl?” She says as she approaches you. You give a slight nod as she undoes your towel leaving you fully naked in front of her, something you have gotten more than used to over the past years, yet you still cant help but blush.

“Up.” Is all she says as she taps your bare bum gently telling you to lift it up, she slides the diaper underneath you perfectly, as you lower your butt back down you feel the familiar soft padding. Next, she tapes each tape around your waist at the perfect level of tightness that you could never seem to get and with this you begin to feel the sense of security that comes with being in diapers as well. With that your mom is done and gives you some light pats on your bum as you stand up.

“Your father and I were just about to look for a movie to watch if you want to join us” she says...
121321121.title: Mom

121322.content:
Ever since you were potty trained, your parents have used night time pull-ups to handle your bedwetting. This makes it easy for you take care of any bathroom needs that might arise at any hour of the night, however it is not uncommon for you to wake up with the pull-up feeling cold and damp and sagging from your waist. At least it keeps your bed dry right?

At this point in his day, Dylan is...
121322.title: Youth pull-up

1213221.content:
Having just finished dinner, you make your way upstairs and into the shower to start off your night time routine. After showering you dry off and walk to your room, before you can close the door your mom peeks in, “Dyl i was thinking it would be best for you to put on a pull-up right now rather than at bedtime.” She said in a semi-discrete volume.

“What? No way i only need them for sleeping why do you want me in them now??” You start getting upset.

“Dylan, last week you had three accidents because you fell asleep before bed time without a pull-up on, not to mention the one you had two nights ago. I just want you to try it for a few nights and if you stop having these accidents you wont have to wear them, ok?” Your mom makes a good point, there were a few time throughout the week where you fell asleep before putting on your night time underwear, leaving you, your clothes, and whatever you fell asleep on, totally soaked. Your mom then leaves you alone in your room telling you that she will make sure you have it on in 5 minutes.

Do you put on the pull up now or insist on waiting til bedtime?
1213221.title: Getting ready for bed

choices: Go see what mom and dad are doing
12132211.content:
You wanted to avoid making your mother mad by not listening to her, so you agree to wear the pull-up right now. You walk to your closet and pick out a pull-up from the open package and look at it, it was white with a light blue trim around the edges of it complete with stars on the front and back that start to fade when they are wet. You slide it up your legs and fit it around your waist then slide a pair of pajama shorts over them as well as a white t shirt.

How will Dylan spend his time before bed?
12132211.title: Now

choices: Decide to use the bathroom anyway
121322111.content:
You decide to stay in your room and relax and play your xbox. As you are putting the disc in your mom returns to your room to make sure you had the pull up on, she walked behind you and pulled open the back of your pjs, “thanks for being good dyl, it will only help you.”
You sort of rolled your eyes and continued to sit down and play your games. After a little over and hour and a half, you start to feel a little twitch in your bladder, you knew the feeing was not that urgent and you Dont need to get up immediatly so...
121322111.title: Play video games

choices: Decided to get up and go to the bathroom
1213221111.content:
You decide to just keep playing as you were in the middle of an online game that could not be paused (something that your parents dont seem to understand).

As time passes the feeling in your bladder gets stronger and stronger until it reached a point where it was urgent that the lazy pre-teen relieve his needs soon. As Dylans game came to an end, it was at that point that he...
1213221111.title: You continue with your game

12132211111.content: Does Dylan make it to the bathroom?
12132211111.title: Decided to get up and go to the bathroom

choices: He makes it out with only a few drops in his pull up
121322111112.content:
As you get up, the slight strain that is put on your bladder muscles was enough to let a little bit of pee slip out and into your pull up. You gasp as you feel the slight wetness and warmth in your pull up

Is Dylan able to get it together and continue to the bathroom
121322111112.title: Some pee slips out

1213221111121.content:
Despite the small amount of pee that was soaked up by your pull-up, you rush to the bathroom with all of your focus on making sure the rest of your pee gets into the toilet. You end up getting to the bathroom, pulling down your pajamas and slightly wet pull-up, and successfully doing your business. However, the usual last drops of pee trickle into your pull-up as you pull them back up, this wasn't new to you as it happens almost every time you go pee, however this only added to the wetness in your pull-up. Leading you to wonder if you should change before bed.

Dylan contemplated changing out of his slightly warm, slightly saggy pull-up, his fear was that if he changed into a new pull-up his mom might notice and continue to make him wear his pull-ups early in the night. However, if he does not change there is a chance that he wakes up to a leaking pull-up, something dylan cant stand.

What does Dylan decide to do?
1213221111121.title: He makes it out with only a few drops in his pu...

1213221111122.content:
The feeling of wetness escaping you was startling causing you to panic and scramble to the bathroom, not realizing that you completely neglected to cut off your stream. By the time you are almost half way to the bathroom door, your pull up is completely soaked and all of the planets and stars on the front have been replaced with a darker stain.

After a few more seconds you are finally done emptying your bladder into your pull up. This brings you back to reality in which you realize that you have been standing in the middle of the hallway, zoned out and looking straight down at your crotch, which is now sagging fairly noticeably.

Does anyone else notice you looking like this?
1213221111122.title: He soaks the pull up

choices: …get up to go to the bathroom after all.
…use your pull-up. It’s what it’s there for.
…find some other means to relieve yourself.
12132211112.content:
You catch yourself drifting off to almost-sleep a few times during your last match. So when your game comes to an end, you take a long yawn and lean over to turn off the console. You groggily stumble to your feet while you stifle another yawn. You kinda gotta take a wee, but decide you’re too lazy and it’s not urgent enough to go all the way to the bathroom. Instead, you walk over to your bed and crawl under the sheets.
Despite your drowsiness, you have trouble going to sleep. Now that you have nothing to distract you from it the pressure in your bladder is hard to ignore. All that pee you’ve stored up begs for release. You…
12132211112.title: Started to feel pretty tired...

choices: Ask your dad to pause it anyway so you can go to the bathroom.
Try to hold it till after the movie.
Just quickly run to the bathroom, you know every scene of the movie in and out.
121322112.content:
You decide to see what mom and dad are doing and find them on the living room couch, watching a movie. Mom eyes you when you enter and gives you an approving smile as she notices the bulge of the pull-up under your pyjama bottoms. When you come over, they shift aside a bit and you quickly slip onto the couch in-between them. You snuggle up to mom and dad puts his arm around both your shoulders. Then the three of you continue watching TV. It’s one of your favourite movies and you know it by heart. You’re confident today you’ll make it all the way and not nod off to sleep before the end like often happens to you.
After a while you feel a little tingle from your bladder, informing you that it requires emptying. The movie has barely reached the half-way mark and it’s just getting exciting. Your dad hates pausing movies.
121322112.title: Go see what mom and dad are doing

122.content: How old is this bedwetter?
122.title: Girl.

12213.content:
Anna is your typical 6 year old American girl, she has blue eyes medium blonde hair and pretty much average height. She lives with her mother betsy and her little brother Jack who's 4 and fully potty trained.
Does Anna...
A.) start off in diapers never dry at night
B.) Started wetting the bed almost a year ago now in pullups at night
C.) Just starting to wet her bed again still wearing panties to bed?
12213.title: Six.

choices: Waking up in the middle of the night.
Talking about bedwetting during the day.
122131.content:
So at the beginning of this story, Anna is fully potty trained during the day but still wears diapers at night because she wets the bed every night.
Where is she now?
122131.title: A

choices: Anna needs to go potty before breakfast
Her mother stops her for a change
Her brother spots her and teases her
1221312.content:
It was a beautiful 7am with birds chirping and the sun shining, when Anna started to stir. She stretched out, yawned rubbed the sleepies out of her eyes and the drool of her chin with the sleeves of her nightie that has snow white front and center. As Anna sat up she felt the familiar simi warm squishiness of her Pampers baby dry, which is ironic because Anna is a 'big girl' and her diaper was never dry for long once diapered and in bed by 7 o'clock sharp every night.
Anna had never had a dry night in her 6 and a half years, the only times it bothered her was when people point out her diaper on long car rides or something like that or when her little brother by 2 years and 4 months pointed them out since he was only 4 and already fully potty trained day and night and has been since he was 2!
But in short the feeling first thing in the morning didn't phase her she jumped out of her bed and slightly toddled down stairs to the kitchen for breakfast.
1221312.title: Waking up in the morning.

12213121.content:
Anna needed to go to the bathroom, so she went to stop by the bathroom before breakfast.
She took off her wet diaper, threw it in the trash, and did her business, then she wiped herself down with wipes, washed her hands, and changed into a pair of undies.
She then went into the kitchen for breakfast.
They were having...
12213121.title: Anna needs to go potty before breakfast

choices: Helps Anna clean up and change for the day
Changes Sarah into another diaper for a day out
Gets Anna ready for school after a quick clean up
12213122.content:
"Oh hi baby, goodmorning.how did you sleep?" Helen, Anna's step mom and Jack's real mom says sitting in the livingroom.
"Oh hi um. Mommy. I was just coming down for breakfast." Anna said quietly, usually the energetic 6 year old isn't so quiet but her step mom scared her not expecting her to be in the livingroom she almost peed her diaper again.
Jack is playing on the floor smiles, quickly get up and runs over to Anna and gives her a big hug. The 4 year old is almost as tall as her and almost mocked her over. He backed a way after a second and turned to his mommy to say "mommy sissy needs a diaper change, she's really wet! See!" Jack says lifting up Anna's nightie revealing the soaked and heavy pamper almost hanging to her knees.
Anna turned a bright red as she pulled her nightie back down. She wanted to argue but knew mommy helen saw and knew she needed to be cleaned up before starting the day.
"Aw come over here sweetie it's ok, it's just hard for Jack to understand that's a sensitive thing for you. He doesn't to upset you. He was potty trained thinking only babies wear diapers so he's still learning here baby." Helen says waving Anna over who's visibility frustrated. Anna toddlers over quickly for a hug with tears in her eyes. Helena picks up Anna "ok let's get you ready for the day then we can eat before we head out!" Helen holds Anna with one hand patting the soaked diaper like any parent does with a baby.
Once upstairs Helen...
12213122.title: Her mother stops her for a change

122131221.content:
(I thought her mother's name was Betsy. Also, Anna only wears diapers to bed.)

Helen, or Betsy, or whatever her name was, didn't need to help that much: Anna was old enough to take off her diaper and put on her own clothes.
But she did help a little bit in making sure she'd cleaned off the pee properly.

Once the pee was cleaned off, Anna changed into some undies, blue overalls, and a pink T-shirt.
She then...
122131221.title: Helps Anna clean up and change for the day

122131222.content:
(Anna only wears diapers to bed.)

As Anna's mother was helping her clean up, she said, "Guess what?!".
"What?" said Anna excitedly!
"We're going on a day out! You, Jack, and me!" said the mother.
"Hooray!" said Anna and she changed into underwear, a blue skirt, an orange shirt, and white socks and sneakers, all ready for her trip to...
122131222.title: Changes Sarah into undies* for a day out

122131223.content:
Anna's mother helped her clean up.
Then, Anna got changed into a purple skirt, underwear, yellow socks, black shoes, and a white T-shirt.
Then, Jack changed into his green pants, blue shirt, and red shoes.
He could mostly do this on his own but needed help putting his shoes on.
The mom brushed Anna's hair, then both kids had breakfast and brushed their teeth.
Finally, she helped them pack their lunches.
Soon, Anna was ready for school and Jack was ready for preschool.
The kids got to school by...
122131223.title: Gets Anna ready for school after a quick clean up

choices: Anna gets cleaned up and dressed.
12213123.content:
"Ha ha!" said Jack, "You're older than me but you wear diapers!"
"Only at night," said Anna.
"But I don't have to wear diapers at night!" said Jack.
"Some people do, some people don't," said their mother, "That's all there is to it. But she'll probably grow out of it."
What happens now?
12213123.title: Her brother spots her and teases her

choices: Waking up in the middle of the night.
122132.content:
Anna was potty trained at three and was dry for a while, but when she was five, she started wetting the bed.
Thankfully, she was taken to the doctor and the cause was not medical, and she's doing fine psychologically, so it's probably deep sleep.
She wears Pull-Ups to bed.
Where is she now?
122132.title: B

choices: Waking up in the middle of the night.
122133.content:
Anna has only just recently started wetting the bed again.
Where is she now?
122133.title: C

1222.content: How old exactly is this girl?

1223.content: What's the exact age of our heroine?

choices: She is at a slumber party
She is at home just about getting ready for bed
She is playing with her sister
12231.content:
Megan has always been a bedwetter.
There have been times before where it got a little better for the short brown haired girl, when she was using an alarm and for a couple of month she was even taking meds. But the alarm stressed her a lot, she even got nightmares of that awful beeping and the midicine made her feel dizzy all the time.
Now, without alarms and meds, she feels better but wets every night again.


How does our story starts?
12231.title: Eleven.

122311.content:
Megan had a nice day.
Right after lunch her mom brought her to her best friend Lisa.
She was not only there to spend the afternoon, tonight they would have a sleepover!

Was it just the two friends or are other friends around too?
122311.title: She is at a slumber party

choices: Yes and shes a bedwetter too/other
1223111.content: Does Lisa allready knows that her best friend is a bedwetter?
1223111.title: Just Megan and Lisa

choices: Lisa is a bedwetter like Megan and they both know
They both wet the bed but dont know about the other
Megan doesnt know that Lisa knows her secret
12231113.content: Lisa is a bedwetter too or something else?
12231113.title: Yes and shes a bedwetter too/other

So they do suffer from bedwetting, but it's early enough to not be able to tell.

Is this a boy or a girl?

info.description:
Rules:
1. Nothing creepy/pervy.
2. Keep it realistic.
3. Focus on bedwetting and nighttime toilet training. Naps are okay as a mini-focus but don't focus on daytime training or accidents.
